docs.text: HDA testing script This repository contains automated testing scripts designed to monitor and verify the quality and availability of data from the HDA and Wekeo Purpose The primary focus of these tests is not to validate the functionalities of the HDA commands themselves, but rather to: Ensure that datasets listed are available Ensure that the retrieval metadata are coherent Ensure that downloading and access speed Current Tests The initial suite of tests includes: Checks of metadata Check of data querying Feedback and Contributions Your questions, feedback, and suggestions are highly welcome! Please reach out to: Guillaume Koenig Email: gkoenig@mercator-ocean.fr Feel free to use, modify, and share these scripts under an open, collaborative spirit.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: This repository contains automated testing scripts designed to monitor and verify the quality and availability of data from the HDA and Wekeo

docs.text: The primary focus of these tests is not to validate the functionalities of the HDA commands themselves, but rather to: Ensure that datasets listed are available Ensure that the retrieval metadata are coherent Ensure that downloading and access speed

docs.text: Your questions, feedback, and suggestions are highly welcome! Please reach out to: Guillaume Koenig Email: gkoenig@mercator-ocean.fr Feel free to use, modify, and share these scripts under an open, collaborative spirit.
docs.title: Feedback and Contributions

docs.text: Further Development Planned Features Test of downloading and not just querying data Automated delivery of test results via email notifications Set up of a database for storing results Automation of the scripts via crontab Setting up a dashboard for observations of results

docs.title: List of Datasets With Errors

docs.text: Usage Most of the scripts can be run independently. To run a script: python script_name.py Scripts Overview main.py Retrieves a list of datasets with their metadata and attempts to build a query and do a search on them. Stores the results of accessibility in a csv file in the "data" directory. metadata_check Retrieves a list of datasets and try to access their metadata. Stores the results in a csv file in the "data" directory. Login The script_to_markdown script requires login to github.
docs.title: Usage

docs.text: Most of the scripts can be run independently. To run a script: python script_name.py
docs.title: Usage

docs.text: main.py Retrieves a list of datasets with their metadata and attempts to build a query and do a search on them. Stores the results of accessibility in a csv file in the "data" directory. metadata_check Retrieves a list of datasets and try to access their metadata. Stores the results in a csv file in the "data" directory.
docs.title: Scripts Overview

docs.text: The script_to_markdown script requires login to github.
docs.title: Login
